hero.tagline: A place to wake up. Or slow down. Ideally both.
hero.taglineAlt: Quiet mornings. Loud laughs. Coffee in between.
hero.subtitle: Specialty Coffee, Breakfast & Brunch — S'Agaró, Costa Brava

producers.title: Our Producers
producers.intro: Coffee, matcha, bread, eggs — every product has a story. We only work with those who share our obsession for doing things right.

questions.reservationAnswer: We don't take reservations — we believe in spontaneous brunch. But don't worry, turnover is quick and we always find a spot. Weekends before 10am are usually quieter.
questions.wifiAnswer: Yes, free and fast. Perfect for getting some work done. But if you're staying all day, we ask you to order something every couple of hours — we're a small café and need the tables.
questions.dogsAnswer: Absolutely! We have a terrace where your furry friend is welcome. Inside we can't due to health regulations, but we always have fresh water outside.
questions.parkingAnswer: Yes, free parking right next to the venue. There's also blue zone parking nearby if it's full.
questions.eventsAnswer: Yes, for small groups outside regular hours. Email us at hola@dirtyrabbit.es with your idea and let's see how we can make magic.
questions.dietaryAnswer: Yes. Vegetarian and vegan options on the menu, plant-based milks available. For gluten-free, ask — we have several options but the kitchen isn't 100% gluten-free.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.intro: Everything you need to know before visiting. If you can't find your answer, get in touch.

howItStarted.title: How It Started
howItStarted.text: In 2024, Iwonka and Franc left behind years of working in luxury restaurants and startups to create something of their own. Something smaller. More honest. A place where people could start their day right — with good coffee, something delicious to eat, and no rush.

whySagaro.title: Why S'Agaró
whySagaro.text: We wanted a place with sun, sea, and a real community. S'Agaró won us over from the first walk along the coast. It's the perfect balance: quiet in winter, lively in summer, and always with that Mediterranean light that changes everything.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.text: We don't chase trends or try to reinvent anything. We simply do things with care. Good ingredients, honest technique, and the time each thing needs. That simple.

theName.title: The Name
theName.text: Why Dirty Rabbit? Because rabbits are curious, quick, and a bit mischievous. And the 'dirty' part... because the best coffee always leaves a mark.

care.title: Care
care.text: Every choice is deliberate. The coffee we serve, the bread we toast, the music playing. Care without pretension.

connection.title: Connection
connection.text: Strangers → regulars → friends. That's the journey. Everyone fits here.

rhythm.title: Rhythm
rhythm.text: Fast beats and slow moments. We match your tempo, not the other way around.
